CustomField.description: This is a hidden field that indicates that the system has already created the marketing campaigns for this event. It is used to prevent the system from automatically creating the campaigns again a second time.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a hidden field that indicates that the system has already created the marketing campaigns for this event. It is used to prevent the system from automatically creating the campaigns again a second time.
CustomField.label: Marketing Campaigns Created
